ygData.subject: Re: help me please
ygData.msgSnippet: I completely AGREE! If someone gave me (or I bought) a 50th level cleric for example I wouldn t know how to play it. There are a lot of things that a
ygData.messageBody:
I completely AGREE! If someone gave me (or I
bought) a 50th level cleric for example I wouldn't know
how to play it.<br><br>There are a lot of things that
a person learns as they build up a character. My
main is a 30th ranger but if someone gave me a 50th
ranger I'd still be in the same boat, I wouldn't know
how to properly play it.<br><br>There's a lot of
player education that goes on in building at character
up. Twinking armor or weapons to a character that you
yourself built isn't as bad because you at least know that
character and using a weapon doesn't really take a lot
beyond target and auto attack.<br><br>Just remember
everyone it is called EverQUEST. That means you quest for
things and thats all part of the fun. Twinking a few
things now and again is ok in my book but just don't
lose sight of the goal! That goal is NOT to get to
level 60 as fast as you can. Its the journey there
thats the fun part. Its the friends that you make along
the way.<br><br>Also keep in mind that all those
things that are sold on either message boards, auctions,
or in EQ are attainable by nothing more than
QUESTing for them and it doesn't cost you anything but
your time and thought.<br><br>Dinbien<br>30th
Ranger<br>Bristlebane server
